name: screenshot-as-a-service
description: Run Headless-Chrome by Puppeteer on AWS Lambda to take screenshots

scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=false npm install && npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && SLOWMO_MS=250 RUNNING_LOCALLY=true node dist/local.js
